payload.message: No code-quality issues reported by Ruff.
payload.rule_family_basis: Ruff exit code 0 indicates all enabled Ruff rules passed; non-zero indicates at least one enabled rule failed.

rule_family_results.examples: Undefined variables, unused imports, redefined names, incorrect __all__
Syntax/indentation errors, invalid escapes, is vs == misuse, ambiguous names
Mutable defaults, risky asserts, loop variable capture, fragile except blocks
Shadowing built-ins, conflicting imports, suspicious name reuse
Unused import removal, import sorting, safe simplifications (when run with --fix)
